tool_description: An API showing all the news on politics in Nigeria.
name: Nigerian Politics News
title: Nigerian Politics News

api_list.name: Get all news on politics in Nigeria from a particular news station
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all the news on politics from a specific new source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nigerian-politics-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/saharareporters"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nigerian-politics-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nigerian-politics-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{source}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nigerian-politics-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
